about_the_game:
Elder's Will: Fight for Your Family in This Action-Packed Platformer


  • Experience a thrilling 2D platformer adventure: where every jump, swing, and thrilling strike fuels your fight for redemption.

  • Master intense combat: Wield your trusty crutches in innovative ways, launching devastating melee attacks and powerful ranged strikes against cunning ninjas, fierce warriors, and monstrous foes. Time your parries, strategize your attacks, and emerge victorious in intense encounters.

  • Navigate diverse environments: Traverse 3 unique environments, mastering platforming challenges and uncovering hidden secrets. Each level presents unique obstacles and surprises.

  • Unleash your potential: As you progress, unlock powerful new abilities like a grappling gun for thrilling swings and a dash maneuver for speedy movement. Expand your options and overcome new challenges.

  • A touching tale of hope: Witness a father's unwavering love as he embarks on a perilous quest to find a cure for his ailing son. Unravel a moving story about self-sacrifice, determination, and the enduring power of family.

linux_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: x64-bit, 2.5 GHz dual-core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan capability.
  • Storage: 3500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minor adjustments to the requirements are possible based on further testing and optimization.

short_description: A Father's Journey. A disabled father, fueled by love, scales treacherous lands with his honed crutches. Master the art of crutch combat, unleash devastating throws in battles, and navigate daring platforming to heal his ailing son. Can you defy despair in this minimalist, stylized 2D platformer?
